Plot: An illiterate stooge in a traveling medicine show wanders into a strange town and is picked up on a vagrancy charge. The town's corrupt officials mistake him for the inspector general whom ...
Title: The Inspector General
Writer: Philip Rapp (screenplay), Harry Kurnitz (screenplay), Nikolai Gogol (suggested by a play by)
